actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide that the costs of certain investigation activities by the Bureau of Reclamation shall be reimbursable.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to permit the costs of an advance planning study of a proposed project by the Bureau of Reclamation to be considered reimbursable construction costs and included in the allocation of construction costs to the proposed project's beneficiaries.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the costs of certain investigation activities by the Bureau of Reclamation shall be reimbursable.
